fields.description:
Implement a simple FSE Chat Room application. The system should allow a user to perform the following functions:
1. Register for the chat room with a new username (one that does not already exist) and password
2. Enter the chat room (Login) with his/her username and password
3. See other users’ chat messages
4. Post a chat message 
5. Leave the chat room gracefully (Logout) without simply closing the browser tab

Implement a simple FSE Chat Room application. The system should allow a user to perform the following functions:
1. Register for the chat room with a new username (one that does not already exist) and password
2. Enter the chat room (Login) with his/her username and password
3. See other users’ chat messages
4. Post a chat message 
5. Leave the chat room gracefully (Logout) without simply closing the browser tab
The total point of the final exam is 70, which takes 35% in the final grade. There are a total of 13 Problems and 10 pages in this exam.
